General.Name: Mega-info Media Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Mega-info Media Co.,Ltd. engages in the development, operation, and advertising of digital media resources in China. It installs and operates media equipment in the waiting area of the high-speed rail station. The company offers digital swiping machine advertisement, TV video advertisement, and digital screen advertising services. As of October 15, 2022, it operates 556 contracted and 461 opened railway passenger stations; and 5385 media screens. Mega-info Media Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is based in Beijing, China.
